defendantAddress: 25 Park Avenue Park Avenue Birmingham West Midlands B1 1AA

offenceResults.applicationTitle: Appearance to make statutory declaration (other than SJP)
offenceResults.impositionOffenceDetails:
IMP - Imprisonment
Committed to prison for 9 Years. Reason: failure to comply with a pre-sentence drug testing order because of an unprovoked attack of a serious nature, because the defendant has a flagrant disregard for court orders, because the defendant has a flagrant disregard for people and their property. Bail remand days to count (Tagged Days): 45. Total custodial period is life.
 
 
FVS - Surcharge
To pay a surcharge of £100.00
Total custodial period is life.

offenceResults.applicationTitle: Appearance to make statutory declaration (other than SJP)
offenceResults.impositionOffenceDetails:
COEW - Community order England / Wales
Community order made. The defendant must comply with the requirements (shown below) by 10/10/2025. 
ACR - Attendance centre
Attendance Centre Requirement: Attend for 9 Hours.

offenceResults.applicationTitle: Appearance to make statutory declaration (other than SJP)
offenceResults.impositionOffenceDetails:
EXCISE - Excise penalty
To pay an excise penalty in the amount of £300.00
FO - Fine
Fined £5500.00
INSTL - Payment terms - Instalments only
Payment terms - Instalments only. £300.00 to be paid monthly. Instalment start date: 12/12/2025.
